channel.title: Altirra update feed (test channel)
channel.description: Automatic update notifications for test versions of the Altirra emulator, used by the Check for Updates feature in the program.

ul.li: Tweaked the Multiplexer emulation to load much faster.
Fixed a bug where connection errors were getting stuck on the Multiplexer device in the device UI.
Fixed modems not being able to dial out to IPv6 addresses.
Fixed SX212 connection speed setting not saving properly.
Fixed SX212 emulation mode setting not switching properly on the fly.
/profile command line switch is no longer case sensitive.
